kpi_info.title: Severely errored seconds
kpi_info.use: Severley Errored Seconds (SES): Counts the number of seconds which contain >= 30% errored blocks or at least one defect. Defect: LOS, LOF, AIS. SES is a subset of ES. Errored block: A block in which one ore more bits are corrupted. SES are not incremented during Unavailable Seconds (UAS) Standard: [G.826] UPDATED: The counter is incremented when a second contains >= 30% errored blocks or at least one defect. The counter is not incremented during periods of unavailable time (UAS). The value of the counter is updated every second.
